title: Issues with loot
body: When I go into the loot section of my client I am unable to take any actions, including opening hextech chests, forging keys, rerolling shards or disenchanting for essence. Nothing appears on the right half of the screen when I click on any items in my loot.

replies.body:
I'm having the same issue but it's just with crafting keys.  I can hover over the key frag and the key frag text comes up but if I left click nothing happens like it should.  If I right click the option to forge a key comes up but clicking on it does nothing.

I can still disenchant and forge other items

This might be the result of a connection problem failing to process transactions or yield your loot.  Start off with the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and clear up those blocks.  Let me know if you run into any issues.
I face the very same issue :) Can't disenchant, can't activate. Can't do anything!
